post:
To everyone from the LevelOneServers team we want to wish you a safe and happy new years! 

We wanted to let everyone know we now are working on getting a secure panel setup and tested so all dedicated server clients are able to manage their dedicated servers without the need for staff or a ticket.

We now also take **Payments with Coinbase, Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Dai, Etherium, Litecoin, and USD Coin**
